page.title: 08CHILDREN'S LIFE STYLES
page.content: As a result of a questionnaire, the following conclusions have been reached. 1.UNDER 10s. They are mostly English, living in owner-occupied detached or semi-detached houses with 4 bedrooms and 2 bathrooms. Most participate in sports at school and read comics. They frequently visit libraries and less often cinemas. Churches, concerts, theatres and sporting events are rarely attended. The majority had a 2-week holiday last year in Britain. 2.11s TO 16s. Almost all live in owner-occupied detached houses with 4/5 bedrooms and 1/2 bathrooms. They are very active in sports, both at school and in clubs. They lead a full social life often going to discos, parties and cinemas. Many go to the library and to church regularly. Holidays are mostly taken in Britain.
